## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G40140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G40140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtC3H29, ATSZF2, CZF1, SZF2, TZF10, ZFAR1</u>
- **Gene Name:** (SALT-INDUCIBLE ZINC FINGER 2, TANDEM ZINC FINGER 10
- **Description:**   zinc finger (CCCH-type) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
